data.text: @kathrynbarger @CAgovernor Lockdown Barbie will mandate masks as long as Emperor Myart-Cruz tells her to.  @LACountyBOS @UTLAnow @UTLAUncensored @MayorOfLA
@kathrynbarger @CAgovernor what about for indoor places like stores or grocery stores ?

@kathrynbarger @CAgovernor But will LAUSD comply? Please continue putting pressure on @UTLAnow and @LAUSDSup to do the right thing and follow the state guidelines. Thank you for your continued support.
@kathrynbarger @CAgovernor Who cares what you have to say masks saves lives
@kathrynbarger @CAgovernor I have a better chance of winning the lotto than LACPH doing anything
@kathrynbarger @CAgovernor California ranked 50th out of 50 states in the reopening of schools. Sadly, we will also be the last to unmask our healthy and developing children.

@kathrynbarger @CAgovernor Your words are meaningless. I’ve heard words the last 2 years. Los Angeles may as well be called the City of Bedrock. Because our health “science” and our politicians are stuck in the Stone Age. https://t.co/GOz0Revylg
